rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1002, ATS1022, ATS2002, ATS2022, CHI1020, CHI1902, CHI2020, CHI2902}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS2023, ATS3023, CHI1030, CHI1210, CHI1903, CHI2210, CHI2903, CHI3903, CHI4030, CHI4903, CHI5030, CHI5903}

description: Chinese Intermediate 1 continues the overview of the important sentence structures of modern standard Chinese begun in Chinese Introductory. Equal emphasis is placed on the four skills of reading, writing, listening and speaking. Speaking classes cover practical, everyday situations, to develop interactive competence at a basic level in a range of situations likely to be encountered in daily life in contemporary China. In addition to regular classroom activities, listening and reading skills will be further developed through the use of audio/visual, Web-based and computer-assisted language learning materials.
